page.title: 18St. Nicholas School Survey.
page.content:
Our small church school in Chislehurst (about 150 children aged 5-11 years) made a survey of popular pastimes.These are the results. Favourite home activities were: Watching television 80%(approx) Games(e.g.board and card) 70%(approx) Reading 70%(approx) Drawing and colouring 60%(approx) Computers 50%(approx)
Favourite sports: Football 35%(approx) Cricket 27%(approx) Tennis 23%(approx) Roller skating 23%(approx) Table tennis 20%(approx) Other interesting results: Over two thirds of the children old enough belonged to scouts,guides,cubs or brownies.About one third of the children collected stamps.
